thread.title: Michelle Obama Wows In Black Vera Wang Dress At State Dinner
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama Wows In Black Vera Wang Dress At State Dinner

author: Dana Oliver
title: Michelle Obama Wows In Black Vera Wang Dress At State Dinner
text:
Michelle Obama Wows In Black Vera Wang Dress At State Dinner Isn't she lovely? Dana Oliver Executive Fashion And Beauty Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 09/25/2015 09:18 PM EDT | Edited: 2 hours ago 
Michelle Obama made a jaw-dropping appearance alongside President Barack Obama as they welcomed Chinese President Xi Jinping to the White House for the State Dinner on Friday. Dressed in a custom, off-the-shoulder black Vera Wang gown, FLOTUS' famously-toned arms were on full display. A photo posted by First Lady Michelle Obama (@michelleobama) on Sep 25, 2015 at 4:34pm PDT 
This isn't the first time that FLOTUS has worn the Chinese-American designer's pieces for a major fête, as she donned a similar off-the-shoulder Wang dress at this year's Kennedy Center Honors . Yet, the mermaid fit and tulle skirt of this State Dinner gown proves why she tops our list of the best-dressed first ladies. 
Do you agree? JIM WATSON via Getty Images Chip Somodevilla via Getty Images Chip Somodevilla via Getty Images JIM WATSON via Getty Images Chip Somodevilla via Getty Images Chip Somodevilla via Getty Images SAUL LOEB via Getty Images
